post:
Hi LET community ;)  
We are pleased to share this LET-exclusive offer:  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

[![OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.](https://www.onvirt.io/assets/OnVirt_724x58.png)](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.")  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

OnVirt is committed to its outstanding VPS performance. To guarantee high VPS performance we are only using quality hardware, KVM virtualziation and do **not** oversubscribe our systems.  

We offer a **14-days full money back guarantee**.  
We accept PayPal and for our European customers SEPA Bank Transfer.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

> [**OnVirt • VPS Small**](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt • VPS Small")
> -
> * 1GB RAM (dedicated, no overcommit)
> * 1 vCPU
> * 30GB SSD space (RAID10)
> * 2TB transfer
> * **Coupon: LET40** (This 40% discount coupon is also valid for our VPS Medium and VPS Large)
> * **6 EUR/month** (final price, no additional tax)
> * 17.10 EUR/quarter (**5% additional discount**)  
> * 32.40 EUR/semi annual (**10% additional discount**)  
> * [Oder here](https://www.onvirt.io/customers/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&language=English&promocode=LET40 "OnVirt • VPS Small")

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Features**
-

Each VPS from OnVirt has the following features:

* 500Mbps uplink
* 1x IPv4
* 1x IPv6
* KVM virtualization
* Instant setup
* Operating Systems: Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora and CentOS
* **Indiviual .iso available upon [request](https://www.onvirt.io/customers/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2&subject=ISO%20Request "OnVirt Support")**
* BGP sessions are available upon request (charges apply). Please contact [OnVirt Support](https://www.onvirt.io/customers/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2&subject=BGP%20Request "OnVirt Support") with your AS number.  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Technical**
-

Our VPS are running on the following **enterprise hardware**:

* Intel Xeon E5-1620v3 CPUs
* DDR4 ECC RAM
* Enterprise-level SSDs (ZFS RAID10)
* SuperMicro Rackservers

Check out our **Looking Glass** at [http://lg.onvirt.io/](http://lg.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt Looking Glass"):  

* Test IPv4: 5.1.75.5  
* Test IPv6: 2a00:f820:50::13:5  

Our high availability and Tier 3 (TIER III) certified **datacenter** is located in Frankfurt, Germany.
The datacenter is equipped with first class carrier connectivity and direct uplinks (each 10 Gbit/s) to Cogent (AS174), Core Backbone (AS33891), DE-CIX / ECIX, DTAG Deutsche Telekom (AS3320), GTT (AS3257), Hibernia (AS5580), Hurricane Electric (AS6939), KleyRex, Voxility (AS3223) and with 1 Gbit/s to DE-CIX New York.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

We have been featured twice on LowEndBox. You may check the comments there,  too.  
[LEB: OnVirt – €4/month 512MB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany](http://lowendbox.com/blog/onvirt-e4month-512mb-kvm-in-frankfurt-germany/ "OnVirt – €4/month 512MB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany")  
[LEB: OnVirt – €6/month 1GB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany](http://lowendbox.com/blog/onvirt-e6-5month-1gb-kvm-25gb-ssd-in-frankfurt-germany/ "OnVirt – €6/month 1GB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany")  

You can find more comments and a speedtest from another LET user in our previous LowEndTalk post:  
[LET: OnVirt – €6/month 1GB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany](http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/61982/onvirt-6-eur-prepaid-kvm-vps-high-performance-ssd-only-germany "OnVirt – €6/month 1GB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany")  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

We are looking forward to your feedback, comments and speedtests :-)

Best Regards  
Sebastian from [OnVirt](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.")
